description: Gorgeous, family friendly 3 large bedrm, 2 den/office & 3 bath townhome at sought after Galliano complex! End unit with amazing huge yard space with turf, covered patio area for back yard family BBQ's & backing onto private greenbelt! Gorgeous professional kitchen overlooking the yard/greenbelt with tons of cupboard space, S/S appliances, granite counters with eat up peninsula plus large eating area with access to the patio/yard. Spacious living rm on main with newer gas fireplace, large den/office space + beautiful 2 pce bath with designer features. Upstairs offers new carpet, huge primary bdrm with walk in closet & 3pce ensuite with walk in shower, plus adjoining den & 2 more large bedrms + 4 pce bath! Quick possession possible! Don't miss out - Open house Sat/Sun, Jan 17/18 2-4!
